TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PropertyListParser extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides methods to parse property lists. It can handle files, input streams and byte arrays. All known property list formats are supported. This class also provides methods to save and convert property lists.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ConvertToASCII (System.IO.FileInfo inFile, System.IO.FileInfo outFile);
.method public static hidebysig void ConvertToASCII(class System.IO.FileInfo inFile, class System.IO.FileInfo outFile) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a given property list file into ASCII format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ConvertToBinary (System.IO.FileInfo inFile, System.IO.FileInfo outFile);
.method public static hidebysig void ConvertToBinary(class System.IO.FileInfo inFile, class System.IO.FileInfo outFile) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a given property list file into the OS X and iOS binary format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ConvertToGnuStepASCII (System.IO.FileInfo inFile, System.IO.FileInfo outFile);
.method public static hidebysig void ConvertToGnuStepASCII(class System.IO.FileInfo inFile, class System.IO.FileInfo outFile) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a given property list file into GnuStep ASCII format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ConvertToXml (System.IO.FileInfo inFile, System.IO.FileInfo outFile);
.method public static hidebysig void ConvertToXml(class System.IO.FileInfo inFile, class System.IO.FileInfo outFile) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a given property list file into the OS X and iOS XML format.

.method public static hidebysig class Claunia.PropertyList.NSObject Parse(unsigned int8[] bytes) cil managed

Docs.param: The property list data as a byte array.
Docs.summary: Parses a property list from a byte array.
Docs.returns: The root object in the property list. This is usually a NSDictionary but can also be a NSArray.

Docs.param: The Stream delivering the property list data.

Docs.summary: Parses a property list from a file.
Docs.returns: The root object in the property list. This is usually a NSDictionary but can also be a NSArray.
